scripts.clean: rimraf dist && mkdirp dist dist/www dist/local dist/local/courses/images dist/local/courses/videos
scripts.dev: yarn clean && yarn copy:www && yarn rollup --watch -c rollup.config.www.js
scripts.inline: yarn html-inline -i dist/local/tmp/index.html -o dist/local/local-presentation.html && rimraf dist/local/tmp
scripts.build:local: yarn copy:local && yarn rollup -c rollup.config.local.js && yarn inline && yarn copy:images && yarn copy:videos
scripts.build:debug: yarn rollup -c rollup.config.debug.js && cp src/__debug__/test.md dist
scripts.build: yarn clean && yarn build:www && yarn build:local
